name: Divvy.bet
description: Divvy.bet is a Solana-powered sports betting protocol designed to break down traditional barriers in the betting industry. With a true web3 experience, users can wager directly from their wallets, providing a seamless experience with each bet made with guaranteed payouts and instant, onchain settlements. By leveraging DeFi technology, Divvy.bet transforms the conventional casino model, allowing users not only to place bets but also to act as the house by contributing liquidity.
